numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that every major sports organization has fewer coaches of color.
2. I wonder why every major sports organization has fewer coaches of color.
3. I am a member of a community of color.
4. This situation has an impact on my community.
5. Some people may try to say that people of color are not fit to be in leadership.
6. People of color are fit to be in leadership.
7. African Americans are people of color.
8. I ask whether African Americans are fit to run sports organizations.
